title: Hour 2: Jerry's World
description:
Marcus Spears goes after Stephen A for dismissing the Cowboys playoff chances. Mad Dog and Marcus Spear get heated debating whether Davante Adams should be frustrated with the Raiders. Plus, find out why Mad Dog is mad about love the Aaron Judge is getting. Stephen A. remains all in with the Chargers despite them starting 1-2. Later Mad Dog and Stephen A clash over whether the Broncos are contenders or pretenders.
